column4: does mounting an ext3 filesystem as ext4 instead improve performance or do you need to enable the new ext4 features?
you can do something to Ext3 to get partial  Ext4 suppourt, you need to clean install and set up proper Ext4 partitions yourself, for the full experience
also apparnatly Ext4 well  the file system  I guess is alright, but Ubuntu's kernel needs some changes for it really
